ops.description: Bank[6][1] = getLastFieldMapId(); // wm does not count

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:34}); // {Barret}
“Yeah, that's probably best…”{PAUSE}“For {Cloud}…
and you…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:41}); // {Barret}
“Why you apologizin'?
We'll come back again an' check on ya.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:42}); // {Barret}
“You take care now, {Tifa}.
And take care of {Cloud}.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:58}); // {Barret}
“We gotta get back to the
Highwind.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:54}); // {Barret}
“Oh, and uh, {Tifa}…
I don't like askin' this but…”{PAUSE}“Are you sure he's really your friend?
And not Sephiroth's shadow?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:57}); // {Barret}
“Yeah?
OK, then…
Sorry for askin'.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:3}); // {Tifa}
“I'm sorry…but I heard a friend
of mine was here…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:9}); // {Tifa}
“Oh…{Cloud}!!
I'm so glad you're safe!?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:15}); // {Tifa}
“{Cloud}!
What happened to you?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:28}); // {Tifa}
“Why?
What do you want me to do?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:32}); // {Tifa}
“I don't care about anything else,
only {Cloud}…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:33}); // {Tifa}
“I…want to be by his side…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:40}); // {Tifa}
“I'm sorry, everyone…
Especially now…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:83}); // {Tifa}
“Don't you worry about
a thing, {Cloud}…”{PAUSE}“I'll see to it that you get
somewhere safe!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:45}); // {Red XIII}
“That's all right.
We'll be by again.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:46}); // {Red XIII}
“Do your best, {Tifa}.
Take care of {Cloud}.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:60}); // {Red XIII}
“We should be getting
back to the Highwind.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:36}); // {Cid}
“Yeah. Right.
Hang in there, {Tifa}.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:43}); // {Cid}
“Don't worry.
I'll stop by again.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:44}); // {Cid}
“You hang in there, {Tifa}.
Take care of {Cloud}.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:59}); // {Cid}
“Now, we gotta be headin' back to
the Highwind.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:76}); // {Cid}
“Damn.
What the hell's goin' on!?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:37}); // {Yuffie}
“Then you gotta do it.
You gotta be true to yourself.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:47}); // {Yuffie}
“No big, no big.
I'll pop in again later.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:61}); // {Yuffie}
“Hey, shouldn't we be gettin'
back to the Highwind?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:38}); // {Cait Sith}
“If {Tifa} were my nurse,
I'd switch places with
{Cloud}any day!

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:49}); // {Cait Sith}
“What're you talkin' about?
We'll stop in again.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:50}); // {Cait Sith}
“Hope {Cloud} gets better soon.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:62}); // {Cait Sith}
“Well, I guess we'd better
go back to the Highwind.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:51}); // {Vincent}
“Don't worry.
We'll return and check on him later.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:77}); // Doctor
“This is bad!!
This one's big!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:2}); // Doctor
“Hey! You barged in here
like Meteor was crashing
down or something.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:25}); // Doctor
“Ahem! Let's excuse ourselves.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:26}); // Doctor
“Listen, would you all mind…
waiting outside?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:82}); // Doctor
“Hmm…It might be safer
to move to an open area.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:84}); // Doctor
“No! The structure can't take it!!
*
Hurry!”

dialogStrings:
Doctor
“Hey! You barged in here
like Meteor was crashing
down or something.”

{Tifa}
“I'm sorry…but I heard a friend
of mine was here…”

Doctor
“Oh…that young fellow!?”{PAUSE}“Don't worry.
He's next door.
But his condition isn't good.”

Doctor
“Mako poisoning…
Quite an advanced case.”{PAUSE}“It appears this young man's been
exposed to high levels of Mako energy
for an extended period of time.”{PAUSE}“He probably has no idea
who or where he is now…”{PAUSE}“Poor fellow,
he can't even speak.
He's literally miles away from us.”{PAUSE}“Some place far away where no one's
ever been…
All alone…”

Doctor
“Listen, would you all mind…
waiting outside?”

{Tifa}
“Why?
What do you want me to do?”

{Tifa}
“Please, {Cloud}…
Talk to me…”{PAUSE}“Tell me you see me,
that you can hear me…
Tell me, please…”

{Tifa}
“I made it this far believing in
the memories we shared.”{PAUSE}“This isn't happening!
It's too cruel!”

{Tifa}
“I don't care about anything else,
only {Cloud}…”

{Yuffie}
“Then you gotta do it.
You gotta be true to yourself.”

{Cait Sith}
“If {Tifa} were my nurse,
I'd switch places with
{Cloud}any day!

{Barret}
“Why you apologizin'?
We'll come back again an' check on ya.”

{Barret}
“You take care now, {Tifa}.
And take care of {Cloud}.”

{Cid}
“You hang in there, {Tifa}.
Take care of {Cloud}.”

{Red XIII}
“That's all right.
We'll be by again.”

{Red XIII}
“Do your best, {Tifa}.
Take care of {Cloud}.”

{Yuffie}
“No big, no big.
I'll pop in again later.”

{Cait Sith}
“What're you talkin' about?
We'll stop in again.”

{Vincent}
“Don't worry.
We'll return and check on him later.”

{Barret}
“Oh, and uh, {Tifa}…
I don't like askin' this but…”{PAUSE}“Are you sure he's really your friend?
And not Sephiroth's shadow?”

{Barret}
“We gotta get back to the
Highwind.”

{Cid}
“Now, we gotta be headin' back to
the Highwind.”

{Red XIII}
“We should be getting
back to the Highwind.”

{Yuffie}
“Hey, shouldn't we be gettin'
back to the Highwind?”

{Cait Sith}
“Well, I guess we'd better
go back to the Highwind.”

{Vincent}
“Very well then, we should
return to the Highwind.”

“She's always there
right by his side.
She must really love him.”{PAUSE}“Even at a time like this
you should never give up hope.
You've got to be strong like her.”

“Sometimes he mumbles
about numbers…
I wonder what it means?”

“She's finally beginning to
look a little tired…
I hope she's all right.”{PAUSE}“No change in his condition,
yet she stays right by his side.
It must be tough on her.”{PAUSE}“If she keeps this up
she's going to get sick…”

Doctor
“I'm sorry…
But your friend's condition
remains unchanged…”{PAUSE}“You'll have to be patient and wait this out.
These things take time.
Just like fine wine, time is of the essence.”

{Cloud}
“A billion mirror fragments…
small…light…”{PAUSE}“taken…angel's…
singing voices…
…Xeno…gears…”

{Tifa}
“{Cloud}…
I don't understand a word.”{PAUSE}“I'm such a fool……
I thought I could do
something to help…”

{Tifa}
“…It's no use…I don't understand
a thing, {Cloud}.”{PAUSE}“What should I do?
What if you never recover
for the rest of your life?”

Doctor
“This is bad!!
This one's big!”

{Tifa}
“Oh god…
The tremors are getting worse.”

Doctor
“Hmm…It might be safer
to move to an open area.”

{Tifa}
“Don't you worry about
a thing, {Cloud}…”{PAUSE}“I'll see to it that you get
somewhere safe!”

Doctor
“No! The structure can't take it!!
*
Hurry!”

“Well anyhow…
Hey, you all look terrible.
Why don't you get some rest?”
